other_tests.findings: Marked variation in fiber size, hypertrophic and round atrophic fibers, marked endomysial fibrosis, phagocytosis, small focus of inflammation surrounding individual muscle cells.
Acute cortical necrosis and acute ischemic changes in glomeruli; mucoid intimal thickening and fibrinoid necrosis affecting arterioles.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Continued to show findings suggestive of myopathy.

other_tests.findings: High T2-weighted signal intensity in left basal ganglia and thalamus, suggested acute and subacute infarctions, brain atrophy, and small-vessel ischemic changes.
